input.sentences: this was the best superhero outfit [male] could come up with on short notice . captain camouflage to the rescue .
[female] went all out for the team . she 's a little pissed off at [male] 's pathetic attempt though .
well | no crime fighting spree should begin sober . this is where our super powers are going to come from - dutch courage .
an army does n't march on its stomach and neither should crime fighters and superheroes . let 's eat !
[female] hood girl ? seriously [female] | [female] is already pissed at [male] and this is your outfit ? it 's going to get ugly ...
output.sentences: The man was dressed to perform a rescue as a superhero in a short skirt.
Some of his team were pissed about the attention he got and were acting pathetic.
The remainder of his team were super and went on a sober spree of celebration
There was a superheroe sized feast that filled their stomachs before the march.
One of the teammates thought she was ugly in her outfit and was pissed.
